DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE : To assess impact duration topical steroid treatment incidence endothelial graft rejection follow normal-risk penetrate keratoplasty ( PK ) . DESIGN : Prospective , institutional , longitudinal , randomized interventional trial include 406 eye ( age : 52 > = 19 year ; follow-up : 42 > = 18months ) . METHODS : Postoperative treatment start prednisolone acetate 1 % eye drop five time daily taper first 6 month . Patients randomise either short-term ( stop topical steroid treatment ) long-term treatment ( continue steroid daily 12 month ) .
